
#Hostility
@percent_general_1 = 0.10
@percent_general_2 = 0.20
@percent_general_3 = 0.30
@percent_general_4 = 0.20 #Courtiers hostility lv2
@percent_vassal_1 = 0.10
@percent_vassal_2 = 0.20
@percent_vassal_3 = 0.30

#stress_gain
@stress_p1 = 10
@stress_p2 = 12
@stress_p3 = 14
@stress_p4 = 18

#stress_loss
@stress_n1 = -6
@stress_n2 = -8
@stress_n3 = -10
@stress_n4 = -12
@stress_n5 = -16
@stress_n6 = -18
@stress_n7 = -24
@stress_n8 = -26
@stress_n9 = -34
@stress_ai = -8

#negative income multiplier (PLAYER)
@income_1 = -6 #dynastyprestige
@income_2 = -14 #Casual Hostility
@income_3 = -18 #Stress lv1 #stw
@income_4 = -22 #Worring Hostility
@income_5 = -26 #Mortal Hostility Stress lv2
@income_6 = -32 #Stress lv3

#positive income multiplier (PLAYER)
@income_1_positive = 4 #dynastyprestige
@income_2_positive = 10 #gold give
@income_4_positive = 14 #gold take
@income_3_positive = 16 #prestige/piety vs #income_5

#negative income multiplier (AI)
@income_1_ai = -2.5 #dynastyprestige
@income_2_ai = -4 #Casual Hostility
@income_3_ai = -8 #Stress lv1 #stw
@income_4_ai = -10 #Worring Hostility
@income_5_ai = -12 #Mortal Hostility Stress lv2
@income_6_ai = -16 #Stress lv3

#positive income multiplier (AI)
@income_1_positive_ai = 2 #dynastyprestige
@income_2_positive_ai = 6
@income_4_positive_ai = 8
@income_3_positive_ai = 12

#min negative values
@max_neg_1 = -24
@max_neg_2 = -32
@max_neg_3 = -48
@max_neg_4 = -64
@max_neg_5 = -96

@legit_neg_2 = -40
@legit_neg_2_ai = -20
@legit_neg_3 = -60

#Tyranny
@paying_ty = 10
@buying_ty_gold = 25
@buying_ty_prestige = 50
@buying_dread_ty = 30

#Absent
@absent_skill = 2
@absent_xp = 500
@absent_prl = -20
@absent_stress_loss = -12
@absent_stress_gain = 12

@expedition_cost = 12

@event_chance_0 = 10 #domain
@event_chance_1 = 15 #councillors events
@event_chance_2 = 30 #dread events
@event_chance_3 = 50 #hostility events
@event_chance_4 = 50 #regency events
@event_chance_5 = 50 #Annual Reports
@event_chance_6 = 100 #War Reports
@event_chance_7 = 20 #unused/flat
@ai_neg_chance = -10 #AI Hostility Defense

@trade_power_lv1 = 3
@trade_power_lv2 = 6
@trade_power_lv3 = 9
@trade_power_lv4 = 12
@trade_power_lv5 = 15
@trade_power_lv1_medit = 4
@trade_power_lv2_medit = 8
@trade_power_lv3_medit = 12
@trade_power_lv4_medit = 16
@trade_power_lv5_medit = 20
@piratary = 15
@piratary_medit = 20

@power_project_lv1 = 8
@power_project_lv2 = 12
@power_project_lv3 = 16
@power_project_lv4 = 20
@power_project_lv5 = 24
@power_project_lose = -22

yearly_global_pulse = {
	on_actions = {
        gpt_corruption
		gpt_dreadfulness
		gpt_events
    }
}

five_year_playable_pulse = {
 	on_actions = {
		delay = { days = { 200 600 } }
     #  gpt_spaws_five
		gpt_spaws_five_auto
    }
}

yearly_playable_pulse = {
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_ai_balance
       gpt_spaws_yearly
	   gpt_diary_events
	   gpt_2_herald
	   gpt_2_herald_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_3_stw
	   gpt_3_stw_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_3_dip
	   gpt_3_dip_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_3_mar
	   gpt_3_mar_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_3_ler
	   gpt_3_ler_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_3_int
	   gpt_3_int_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_3_spouse
	   gpt_3_spouse_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_minor_stress
	   gpt_high_stress
	   gpt_minor_stress_tribal
	   gpt_high_stress_tribal
	   gpt_breakdown_stress
	   gpt_breakdown_stress_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_rival_hostility
	   gpt_rival_hostility_tribal
	   gpt_vassal_antagonism
	   gpt_vassal_antagonism_tribal
	   gpt_clergy_aversion
	   gpt_clergy_aversion_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_disloyal_knights
	   gpt_peasant_strife
	   gpt_house_head_positive
	   gpt_house_head_negative
	   gpt_courtier_disdain
	   gpt_disloyal_knights_tribal

	   gpt_house_head_positive_tribal
	   gpt_house_head_negative_tribal
	   gpt_courtier_disdain_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_buy_prestige
	   gpt_buy_piety
	   gpt_buy_renown
	   gpt_buy_dread

	   gpt_tyranny_prestige_tribal
	   gpt_tyranny_dread_tribal
	   gpt_tyranny_army_tribal
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_absent
	   gpt_sponsoring
    }
 	on_actions = {
	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_3_stw_regent
	   gpt_3_dip_regent
	   gpt_3_mar_regent
	   gpt_3_int_regent
	   gpt_3_ler_regent

	   gpt_3_dip_regent_tribal

	   gpt_3_ler_regent_tribal

    }

	   delay = { days = { 90 270 } }
	   gpt_piracy
	   gpt_rival_covert_operations
	   gpt_ruler_favoritism
    }
}

gpt_ai_balance = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
				is_landed = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
				 	has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
				}
			}
			add_stress = @stress_ai
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_trait = diligent
						has_trait = paranoid
					}
				}
				add_stress = @stress_ai
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tyranny >= 5
				}
				add_tyranny = -1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tyranny >= 10
				}
				add_tyranny = -1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tyranny >= 15
				}
				add_tyranny = -1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gold >= 2500
					prestige <= 300
				}
				add_prestige = 300
				remove_short_term_gold = 150
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gold >= 2500
					piety <= 300
				}
				add_piety = 300
				remove_short_term_gold = 150
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gold <= 600
					prestige >= 6000
				}
				add_prestige = -600
				add_gold = 300
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gold <= 600
					piety >= 6000
				}
				add_piety = -600
				add_gold = 300
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
				 	has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
					highest_held_title_tier = 2
				}
				add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv1 }
				add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
				 	has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
					highest_held_title_tier = 3
				}
				add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv2 }
				add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
				 	has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
					highest_held_title_tier = 4
				}
				add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv3 }
				add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
				 	has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
					highest_held_title_tier = 5
				}
				add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv4 }
				add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv4 }
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_spaws_five = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_game_rule = GPT_spawn_enabled
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				trigger_event = {
					id = create_relationship.0001
					days = { 30 180 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_spaws_five_auto = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_game_rule = GPT_spawn_enabled
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2
				age >= 21
				is_landed = yes
				is_imprisoned = no
			}
			random_list = {
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = brave } brave_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = craven } craven_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = calm } calm_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = wrathful } wrathful_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = chaste } chaste_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = lustful } lustful_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = content } content_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = ambitious } ambitious_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = diligent } diligent_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = lazy } lazy_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = forgiving } forgiving_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = generous } generous_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = vengeful } vengeful_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = greedy } greedy_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = gregarious } gregarious_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = shy } shy_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = deceitful } deceitful_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = honest } honest_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = humble } humble_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = arrogant } arrogant_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = just } just_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = arbitrary } arbitrary_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = patient } patient_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = impatient } impatient_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = temperate } temperate_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = gluttonous } gluttonous_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = trusting } trusting_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = paranoid } paranoid_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = zealous } zealous_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = cynical } cynical_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = compassionate } compassionate_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = callous } callous_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = sadistic } sadistic_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = stubborn } stubborn_character_create = true }
				0 = { modifier = { add = 35 has_trait = fickle } fickle_character_create = true }
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_spaws_yearly = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = GPT_spawn_enabled
					has_game_rule = GPT_friendsfoes_disabled
				}
				NOT = { government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
				is_landed = yes
				is_imprisoned = no
				age >= 12
			}
			random = {
				chance = 0
				modifier = { add = 20 is_ai = no }
				modifier = { add = 5 highest_held_title_tier >= 3 }
				modifier = { add = 10 highest_held_title_tier >= 4 }
				modifier = { add = 15 highest_held_title_tier >= 5 }
				trigger_event = {
					id = qss_decisions.0010
					days = { 30 180 }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = GPT_spawn_enabled
					has_game_rule = GPT_friendsfoes_disabled
				}
				government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				is_landed = yes
				is_imprisoned = no
				age >= 12
			}
			random = {
				chance = 0
				modifier = { add = 10 is_ai = no }
				modifier = { add = 5 highest_held_title_tier >= 3 }
				modifier = { add = 10 highest_held_title_tier >= 4 }
				modifier = { add = 15 highest_held_title_tier >= 5 }
				trigger_event = {
				 	id = qss_decisions.0009
					days = { 30 180 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


gpt_corruption = {
	trigger = {
		has_game_rule = GPT_balance_enabled
	}
	effect = {
		every_ruler = { #Corruption
			if = {
				limit = {
					highest_held_title_tier >= 3
					is_landed = yes
					is_imprisoned = no
				}


				if = {
					limit = {
						gold >= 5000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_gold_lv5 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_corruption_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_gold_title
							desc = corruption_gold_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_gold_lv5 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_gold_lv5
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						gold >= 4000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_gold_lv4 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_corruption_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_gold_title
							desc = corruption_gold_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_gold_lv4 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_gold_lv4
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						gold >= 3000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_gold_lv3 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_corruption_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_gold_title
							desc = corruption_gold_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_gold_lv3 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_gold_lv3
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						gold >= 2000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_gold_lv2 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_corruption_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_gold_title
							desc = corruption_gold_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_gold_lv2 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_gold_lv2
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						gold >= 1000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_gold_lv1 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_corruption_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_gold_title
							desc = corruption_gold_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_gold_lv1 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_gold_lv1
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else = {  }



				if = {
					limit = {
						piety >= 5000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_piety_lv5 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_ingratitude_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_piety_title
							desc = corruption_piety_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_piety_lv5 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_piety_lv5
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety >= 4000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_piety_lv4 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_ingratitude_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_piety_title
							desc = corruption_piety_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_piety_lv4 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_piety_lv4
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety >= 3000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_piety_lv3 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_ingratitude_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_piety_title
							desc = corruption_piety_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_piety_lv3 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_piety_lv3
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety >= 2000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_piety_lv2 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_ingratitude_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_piety_title
							desc = corruption_piety_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_piety_lv2 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_piety_lv2
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						piety >= 1000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_piety_lv1 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_ingratitude_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_piety_title
							desc = corruption_piety_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_piety_lv1 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_piety_lv1
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else = {  }





				if = {
					limit = {
						prestige >= 5000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_prestige_lv5 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_sabotage_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_prestige_title
							desc = corruption_prestige_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_prestige_lv5 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_prestige_lv5
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						prestige >= 4000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_prestige_lv4 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_sabotage_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_prestige_title
							desc = corruption_prestige_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_prestige_lv4 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_prestige_lv4
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						prestige >= 3000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_prestige_lv3 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_sabotage_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_prestige_title
							desc = corruption_prestige_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_prestige_lv3 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_prestige_lv3
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						prestige >= 2000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_prestige_lv2 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_sabotage_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_prestige_title
							desc = corruption_prestige_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_prestige_lv2 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_prestige_lv2
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						prestige >= 1000
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_prestige_lv1 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_sabotage_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_prestige_title
							desc = corruption_prestige_lv5_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_prestige_lv1 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_prestige_lv1
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else = {  }
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					highest_held_title_tier >= 4
				 #	NOT = { has_government = celestial_government }
				 #	always = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 300
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_realm_lv10 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_realmsize_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_realm_title
							desc = corruption_realm_lv10_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_realm_lv10 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_realm_lv10
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 275
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_realm_lv9 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_realmsize_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_realm_title
							desc = corruption_realm_lv10_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_realm_lv9 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_realm_lv9
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 250
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_realm_lv8 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_realmsize_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_realm_title
							desc = corruption_realm_lv10_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_realm_lv8 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_realm_lv8
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 225
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_realm_lv7 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_realmsize_bad_with_text
							title = corruption_realm_title
							desc = corruption_realm_lv10_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_realm_lv7 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_realm_lv7
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 200

							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_realm_lv6 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_realm_lv6
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 175

							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_realm_lv5 }

						days = 370

						sub_realm_size >= 150

							desc = corruption_realm_lv10_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_realm_lv4 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = corruption_realm_lv4
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 125
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_realm_lv3 }

					}
					add_character_modifier = {

						days = 370

						days = 370

						days = 370

						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = small_realm_lv2
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 20
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = small_realm_lv3 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_realmsize_good_with_text
							title = corruption_realm_title
							desc = small_realm_lv1_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = small_realm_lv3 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = small_realm_lv3
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 10
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = small_realm_lv4 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_realmsize_good_with_text
							title = corruption_realm_title
							desc = small_realm_lv1_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = small_realm_lv4 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = small_realm_lv4
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						sub_realm_size >= 0
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_character_modifier = small_realm_lv5 }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_realmsize_good_with_text
							title = corruption_realm_title
							desc = small_realm_lv1_desc
							show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = small_realm_lv5 years = 1 } }
						}
					}
					add_character_modifier = {
						modifier = small_realm_lv5
						days = 370
					}
				}
				else = {  }
			}		
		}
	}
}

gpt_dreadfulness = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_enabled
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_land_disabled
		}
	}
	effect = {
		every_ruler = { #Dreadfulness
			if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread >= 80
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv8 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_bad_with_text
						title = corruption_dread_title
						desc = corruption_dread_dreadful_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv8 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv8
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread >= 60
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv7 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_bad_with_text
						title = corruption_dread_title
						desc = corruption_dread_dreadful_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv7 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv7
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread >= 50
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv6 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_bad_with_text
						title = corruption_dread_title
						desc = corruption_dread_moderate_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv6 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv6
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread >= 40
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv5 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_bad_with_text
						title = corruption_dread_title
						desc = corruption_dread_moderate_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv5 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv5
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread >= 30
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv4 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_good_with_text
						title = corruption_peace_title
						desc = corruption_dread_fair_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv4 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv4
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread >= 20
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv3 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_good_with_text
						title = corruption_peace_title
						desc = corruption_dread_fair_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv3 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv3
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread >= 10
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv2 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_good_with_text
						title = corruption_peace_title
						desc = corruption_dread_inoffensive_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv2 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv2
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					days_as_ruler >= 1000
					dread < 10
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_character_modifier = corruption_dread_lv1 }
					}
					send_interface_message = {
						type = event_dreadfull_good_with_text
						title = corruption_peace_title
						desc = corruption_dread_inoffensive_desc
						show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = corruption_dread_lv1 years = 1 } }
					}
				}
				add_character_modifier = {
					modifier = corruption_dread_lv1
					days = 370
				}
			}
			else = {}
		}
	}
}

gpt_events = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_even_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		every_ruler = { #Anual Reports
			if = {
				limit = {
				 #	is_at_war = no
			 #	age >= 14
			 #	is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					NOR = {
						# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
						government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
						culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = @event_chance_5
					random_list = {
						1 = {
							send_interface_message = {
								type = event_report_bad_with_text
								title = random_domain_malus_1_t
								desc = random_domain_malus_1_d
							#	left_icon = root
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_character_modifier = { modifier = random_domain_malus_1 years = 1 } }
							}
							add_stress = @stress_p1
							add_character_modifier = {
								modifier = random_domain_malus_1
								days = 370
							}
						}
						1 = {
							send_interface_message = {
								type = event_report_bad_with_text
								title = random_domain_malus_2_t
								desc = random_domain_malus_2_d
							#	left_icon = root
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_character_modifier = { modifier = random_domain_malus_2 years = 1 } }
							}
							add_stress = @stress_p1
							add_character_modifier = {
								modifier = random_domain_malus_2
								days = 370
							}
						}
						1 = {
							send_interface_message = {
								type = event_report_bad_with_text
								title = random_domain_malus_3_t
								desc = random_domain_malus_3_d
							#	left_icon = root
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_character_modifier = { modifier = random_domain_malus_3 years = 1 } }
							}
							add_stress = @stress_p1
							add_character_modifier = {
								modifier = random_domain_malus_3
								days = 370
							}
						}
						1 = {
							send_interface_message = {
								type = event_report_bad_with_text
								title = random_domain_malus_4_t
								desc = random_domain_malus_4_d
							#	left_icon = root
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_character_modifier = { modifier = random_domain_malus_4 years = 1 } }
							}
							add_stress = @stress_p1
							add_character_modifier = {
								modifier = random_domain_malus_4
								days = 370
							}
						}
						1 = {
							send_interface_message = {
								type = event_report_bad_with_text
								title = random_domain_malus_5_t
								desc = random_domain_malus_5_d
							#	left_icon = root
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_character_modifier = { modifier = random_domain_malus_5 years = 1 } }
							}
							add_stress = @stress_p1
							add_character_modifier = {
								modifier = random_domain_malus_5
								days = 370
							}
						}
						1 = {
							send_interface_message = {
								type = event_report_bad_with_text
								title = random_domain_malus_6_t
								desc = random_domain_malus_6_d
							#	left_icon = root
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_character_modifier = { modifier = random_domain_malus_6 years = 1 } }
							}
							add_stress = @stress_p1
							add_character_modifier = {
								modifier = random_domain_malus_6
								days = 370
							}
						}
						1 = {
							send_interface_message = {
								type = event_report_bad_with_text
								title = random_domain_malus_7_t

			if = {
				limit = {
				#	always = no
					is_at_war = yes

gpt_diary_events = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_even_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

	#	every_ruler = { #Ruler's Diary
			if = {
				limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
					is_imprisoned = no
				 	is_at_war = no
					has_dynasty = yes
					NOR = {
						# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
						government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
						culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
					}
				}
				##########################
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = diary_event_2
							has_dynasty = yes
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = {
							value = martial
							divide = 8
							max = 2
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_martial_good_with_text
							title = diary_event_1_t
							desc = diary_event_1_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } add_character_modifier = { modifier = diary_event_1 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2
						if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } }
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = diary_event_1
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = diary_event_1
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 1
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_martial_bad_with_text
							title = diary_event_2_t
							desc = diary_event_2_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } add_character_modifier = { modifier = diary_event_2 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2
						if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } }
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = diary_event_2
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				##########################
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = diary_event_4
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = {
							value = learning
							divide = 8
							max = 2
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_learning_good_with_text
							title = diary_event_3_t
							desc = diary_event_3_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } add_character_modifier = { modifier = diary_event_3 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } }
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = diary_event_3
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = diary_event_3
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 1
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_learning_bad_with_text
							title = diary_event_4_t
							desc = diary_event_4_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } add_character_modifier = { modifier = diary_event_4 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } }

							days = 370
						}
					}
				}

						}

						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = diary_event_5
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							has_character_modifier = diary_event_5
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 1
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_intrigue_bad_with_text
							title = diary_event_6_t
							desc = diary_event_6_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 add_dread = -15 add_character_modifier = { modifier = diary_event_6 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 add_dread = -15
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = diary_event_6
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				##########################
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = diary_event_8
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = {
							value = stewardship
							divide = 8
							max = 2
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stewardship_good_with_text
							title = diary_event_7_t
							desc = diary_event_7_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } add_character_modifier = { modifier = diary_event_7 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } }
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = diary_event_7
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = diary_event_7
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 1
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stewardship_bad_with_text
							title = diary_event_8_t
							desc = diary_event_8_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } add_character_modifier = { modifier = diary_event_8 years = 1 } }
						}	
						add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = diary_event_8
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				##########################
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = diary_event_10
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = {
							value = diplomacy
							divide = 8
							max = 2
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_diplomacy_good_with_text

				limit = {
					has_dynasty = yes
			 	age >= 14
				has_active_diarchy = no

				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes

							title = tribal_diary_event_25_t
							desc = tribal_diary_event_25_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 add_dread = 15 add_character_modifier = { modifier = tribal_diary_event_25 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 add_dread = 15
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = tribal_diary_event_25
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = tribal_diary_event_25
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 1
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_prowess_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_event_26_t
							desc = tribal_diary_event_26_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 add_dread = -15 add_character_modifier = { modifier = tribal_diary_event_26 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 add_dread = -15
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = tribal_diary_event_26
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				##########################
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = tribal_diary_event_28
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = {
							value = prowess
							divide = 12
							max = 2
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_prowess_good_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_event_27_t
							desc = tribal_diary_event_27_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 add_dread = 15 add_character_modifier = { modifier = tribal_diary_event_27 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 add_dread = 15
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = tribal_diary_event_27
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOR = {
							has_character_modifier = tribal_diary_event_27
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 1
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_prowess_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_event_28_t
							desc = tribal_diary_event_28_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 add_dread = -15 add_character_modifier = { modifier = tribal_diary_event_28 years = 1 } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 add_dread = -15
						add_character_modifier = {
							modifier = tribal_diary_event_28
							days = 370
						}
					}
				}
			}
	#	}
	}
}


gpt_2_herald = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
			 #	NOT = { has_trait = gpt_absent }
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = domain_size
					multiply = @event_chance_0
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 1 } add = 10 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 2 } add = 5 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 5 } add = -10 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 6 } add = -20 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 7 } add = -30 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 8 } add = -40 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size >= 9 } add = -50 }
				}
				random_held_county = { save_scope_as = rnd_county }
				random_list = {
					10 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_herald_bad_with_text
							title = random_herald_malus_01_t
							desc = random_herald_malus_01_d
							left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = random_herald_malus_01 years = 5 } } add_stress = @stress_p1 }
						}
						scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = random_herald_malus_01 years = 5	} } add_stress = @stress_p1 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_herald_good_with_text
							title = random_herald_bonus_01_t
							desc = random_herald_bonus_01_d
							left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = random_herald_bonus_01 years = 5 } } add_stress = @stress_n1 }
						}
						scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = random_herald_bonus_01 years = 5	} } add_stress = @stress_n1 
					}
					######
					10 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {

						scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = random_herald_malus_03 years = 5	} } add_stress = @stress_p1 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = learning }

							type = event_herald_good_with_text

		}
	}

gpt_2_herald_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
			 #	NOT = { has_trait = gpt_absent }
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = domain_size
					multiply = @event_chance_0
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 1 } add = 10 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 2 } add = 5 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 5 } add = -10 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 6 } add = -20 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 7 } add = -30 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size = 8 } add = -40 }
					if = { limit = { domain_size >= 9 } add = -50 }
				}
				random_held_county = { save_scope_as = rnd_county }
				random_list = {
					10 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_herald_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_herald_malus_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_herald_malus_01_d
							left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_malus_01 years = 5 } } add_stress = @stress_p1 }
						}
						scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_malus_01 years = 5	} } add_stress = @stress_p1 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_herald_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_herald_bonus_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_herald_bonus_01_d
							left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_bonus_01 years = 5 } } add_stress = @stress_n1 }
						}
						scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_bonus_01 years = 5	} } add_stress = @stress_n1 
					}
					######
					10 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_herald_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_herald_malus_06_t
							desc = tribal_random_herald_malus_06_d
							left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_malus_01 years = 5 } } add_stress = @stress_p1 }
						}
						scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_malus_01 years = 5	} } add_stress = @stress_p1 
					}

						modifier = { add = learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_herald_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_herald_bonus_14_t
							desc = tribal_random_herald_bonus_14_d
							left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_bonus_03 years = 5 } } add_stress = @stress_n1 }
						}
						scope:rnd_county = { add_county_modifier = { modifier = tribal_random_herald_bonus_03 years = 5	} } add_stress = @stress_n1 
					}
					######
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_high_stress = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				stress_level = 2
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }

			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {

gpt_breakdown_stress = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				stress_level = 3
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {

							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } }

						else = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } 
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_bad_with_text
							title = diary_high_stress_breakdown_08_t
							desc = diary_high_stress_breakdown_08_d
							left_icon = root
							if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } }
							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } }
						}
						if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
							add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } }
						}
						else = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } 
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_rival_hostility = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					num_of_relation_rival >= 1
					num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = intrigue multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_spymaster
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 15 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }

							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_casual_01_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_casual_01_d

					}

						modifier = { add = 30 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }

							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_casual_07_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_casual_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 num_of_relation_rival >= 2 }
						modifier = { add = 30 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_worrying_07_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_worrying_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_rival >= 3 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_mortal_07_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_mortal_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 15 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_casual_08_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_casual_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 num_of_relation_rival >= 2 }
						modifier = { add = 30 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_worrying_08_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_worrying_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_rival >= 3 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_mortal_08_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_mortal_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }

						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 num_of_relation_rival >= 2 }
						modifier = { add = 30 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_worrying_09_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_worrying_09_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_rival >= 3 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_rival_hostility_mortal_09_t
							desc = random_rival_hostility_mortal_09_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_vassal_antagonism = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					any_vassal = {
						percent >= @percent_vassal_1
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value <= -50
						}
					}
					any_powerful_vassal = {
						count >= 1
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value <= -50
						}
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = diplomacy multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_chancellor
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_chancellor.diplomacy multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_antagonism_casual_01_t
							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_01_t
							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_01_t
							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3_ai }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_antagonism_casual_02_t
							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_casual_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_02_t
							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_02_d

							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }

							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_03_d

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_05_t
							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_05_d

						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL

							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }

						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_05_t
							desc = random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_05_d

					}

	}

gpt_disloyal_knights = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_knight = {
					percent >= @percent_general_1
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value <= -50
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = martial multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_marshal
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_marshal.martial multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_disloyal_knights_casual_01_t
							desc = random_disloyal_knights_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_disloyal_knights_worrying_01_t
							desc = random_disloyal_knights_worrying_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_01_t
							desc = random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_disloyal_knights_casual_02_t
							desc = random_disloyal_knights_casual_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }

						}

					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
