						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_disloyal_knights_casual_03_t
							desc = random_disloyal_knights_casual_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_disloyal_knights_worrying_03_t
							desc = random_disloyal_knights_worrying_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }

}

gpt_peasant_strife = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_held_county = {
					percent >= @percent_general_1
					county_opinion_target = {
						target = root
						value <= -50
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = stewardship multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_steward
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_steward.stewardship multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_peasant_strife_casual_01_t
							desc = random_peasant_strife_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}

gpt_clergy_aversion = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					num_sinful_traits >= 1
					piety_level = 0
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					if = { limit = { num_virtuous_traits >= 1 } add = -20 }
					if = { limit = { piety_level >= 2 } add = -10 }
					#add = { value = learning multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_court_chaplain.learning multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 15 num_sinful_traits >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_clergy_aversion_casual_01_t
							desc = random_clergy_aversion_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 30 num_sinful_traits >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_clergy_aversion_worrying_01_t
							desc = random_clergy_aversion_worrying_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 piety_level = 0 num_sinful_traits >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_sinful_traits >= 3 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_clergy_aversion_mortal_01_t
							desc = random_clergy_aversion_mortal_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 15 num_sinful_traits >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text

gpt_house_head_positive = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				house = {
					any_house_member = {
						percent >= 0.5
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value >= 50
						}
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				random_list = {					
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_01_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_02_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_03_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_04_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_05_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_06_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_07_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_08_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_09_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_09_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = random_house_bonus_10_t
							desc = random_house_bonus_10_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_house_head_negative = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				house = {
					any_house_member = {
						percent >= @percent_general_1
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value <= -50
						}
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_2
					add = { value = dread multiply = -0.5 }
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_01_t
							desc = random_house_malus_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_02_t
							desc = random_house_malus_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_03_t
							desc = random_house_malus_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_04_t
							desc = random_house_malus_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_05_t
							desc = random_house_malus_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_06_t
							desc = random_house_malus_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_07_t
							desc = random_house_malus_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root

							desc = random_house_malus_08_d

						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = random_house_malus_09_t
							desc = random_house_malus_09_d
						 #	left_icon = root

gpt_courtier_disdain = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_courtier = {
					percent >= @percent_general_1
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value <= -50
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = 40
					add = { value = dread multiply = -0.5 }
					add = { value = primary_spouse.dread multiply = -0.5 }
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 15 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_casual_disrespect_01_t
							desc = random_casual_disrespect_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 25 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_4 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_worrying_disrespect_01_t
							desc = random_worrying_disrespect_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 15 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_casual_disrespect_02_t
							desc = random_casual_disrespect_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 25 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_4 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_worrying_disrespect_02_t
							desc = random_worrying_disrespect_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 15 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_casual_disrespect_03_t
							desc = random_casual_disrespect_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 25 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_4 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_worrying_disrespect_03_t
							desc = random_worrying_disrespect_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 15 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = random_casual_disrespect_04_t
							desc = random_casual_disrespect_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}

							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text

							desc = random_worrying_disrespect_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disrespectful_courtier_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}

							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text

							desc = random_casual_disrespect_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root

							desc = random_casual_disrespect_06_d

							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text

							desc = random_casual_disrespect_09_d

	}

gpt_minor_stress_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				stress_level = 1
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }

			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_good_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_stress_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_diary_stress_event_01_d
							left_icon = root

								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n5 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_2 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_2 } } }
							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_2 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_2 } } } }
						}

						}
						else = { add_stress = @stress_n4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_2 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_2 } } } 
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {

gpt_high_stress_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				stress_level >= 2
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_high_stress_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_diary_high_stress_event_01_d
							left_icon = root
							if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n8 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } }
							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n6 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } } }
						}
						if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
							add_stress = @stress_n8 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
						}
						else = { add_stress = @stress_n6 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } } 
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_high_stress_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_diary_high_stress_event_02_d
							left_icon = root
							if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n8 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } }
							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n6 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } } }

							add_stress = @stress_n8 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }

					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_high_stress_event_03_t
							desc = tribal_diary_high_stress_event_03_d
							left_icon = root

								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n8 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } }

gpt_breakdown_stress_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				stress_level = 3
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_high_stress_breakdown_01_t
							desc = tribal_diary_high_stress_breakdown_01_d
							left_icon = root
							if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } }
							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } }

							add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } }
						}
						else = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } 
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_high_stress_breakdown_07_t
							desc = tribal_diary_high_stress_breakdown_07_d
							left_icon = root
							if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } }
							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } }
						}
						if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
							add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } }
						}
						else = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } 
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stressed_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_high_stress_breakdown_08_t
							desc = tribal_diary_high_stress_breakdown_08_d
							left_icon = root
							if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
								show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } }
							}
							else = { show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } }
						}
						if = { limit = { has_trait = diligent }
							add_stress = @stress_n9 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } }
						}
						else = { add_stress = @stress_n7 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6 max = @max_neg_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_6_ai max = @max_neg_5 } } } 
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_rival_hostility_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					num_of_relation_rival >= 1
					num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = intrigue multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_spymaster
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_rival >= 2 }
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_rival >= 3 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_mortal_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_mortal_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_rival >= 2 }
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_rival >= 3 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_mortal_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_mortal_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_rival >= 2 }
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_rival >= 3 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_mortal_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_mortal_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}

					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_rival >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 8 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_06_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_casual_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_rival >= 2 }
						modifier = { add = 23 num_of_relation_nemesis >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_rival_hostility_worrying_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = rivalry_low_intrigue_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

gpt_vassal_antagonism_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					any_vassal = {
						percent >= @percent_vassal_1
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value <= -50
						}
					}
					any_powerful_vassal = {
						count >= 1
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value <= -50
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = diplomacy multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_chancellor
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_chancellor.diplomacy multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_casual_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3_ai }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_casual_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_casual_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_dangerous_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_3_ai }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_casual_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_casual_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root

					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 OR = { 
							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }
							any_powerful_vassal = { count >= 1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						}
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_vassal_antagonism_worrying_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai } custom_tooltip = { text = vassal_antagonism_tip } }

						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_2_ai }

						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1 } else = { add_legitimacy = @legit_neg_1_ai }

							any_vassal = { percent >= @percent_vassal_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } }

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_clergy_aversion_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					num_sinful_traits >= 1
					piety_level = 0
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					if = { limit = { num_virtuous_traits >= 1 } add = -20 }
					if = { limit = { piety_level >= 2 } add = -10 }
					#add = { value = learning multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_court_chaplain.learning multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 15 num_sinful_traits >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_casual_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 30 num_sinful_traits >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_worrying_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_worrying_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 piety_level = 0 num_sinful_traits >= 1 }
						modifier = { add = 60 num_sinful_traits >= 3 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_mortal_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_mortal_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 15 num_sinful_traits >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_casual_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_casual_02_d

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 8 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 8 num_sinful_traits >= 1 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_casual_06_t
							desc = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_casual_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 23 piety_level = 0 }
						modifier = { add = 30 num_sinful_traits >= 2 }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_worrying_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_clergy_aversion_worrying_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = clergy_aversion_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_peasant_strife_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_held_county = {
					percent >= @percent_general_1
					county_opinion_target = {
						target = root
						value <= -50
					}
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = stewardship multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_steward
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_steward.stewardship multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}

					}
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_06_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					10 = { # CASUAL

							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root

						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					10 = { # CASUAL
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_08_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = peasant_strife_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					10 = { # CASUAL

							title = tribal_random_peasant_casual_09_t
							desc = tribal_random_peasant_casual_09_d
