gpt_house_head_positive_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				house = {
					any_house_member = {
						percent >= 0.5
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value >= 50
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				random_list = {					
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_06_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_07_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_08_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_09_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_09_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # RELIABLE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_bonus_10_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_bonus_10_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = reliable_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n3 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = gpt_reliable_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_house_head_negative_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				house = {
					any_house_member = {
						percent >= @percent_general_1
						opinion = {
							target = root
							value <= -50
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_2
					add = { value = dread multiply = -0.5 }
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_06_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_07_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_08_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_09_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_09_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
					10 = { # TROUBLED
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_house_head_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_house_malus_10_t
							desc = tribal_random_house_malus_10_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = troubled_house_head_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = troubled_house_modifier years = 3 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

gpt_disloyal_knights_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_knight = {
					percent >= @percent_general_1
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value <= -50
					}
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = martial multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_marshal
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_marshal.martial multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_worrying_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_worrying_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_worrying_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_worrying_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }
					}
					0 = { # CASUAL
						modifier = { add = 15 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }
					}
					0 = { # WORRING
						modifier = { add = 30 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_2 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_worrying_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_worrying_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p3 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4 max = @max_neg_3 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_ai max = @max_neg_3 } }
					}
					0 = { # MORTAL
						modifier = { add = 60 any_knight = { percent >= @percent_general_3 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_dangerous_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p4 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 max = @max_neg_4 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai max = @max_neg_4 } }

							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } } custom_tooltip = { text = disloyal_knights_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2 max = @max_neg_1 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_ai max = @max_neg_1 } }

							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text

							desc = tribal_random_disloyal_knights_casual_05_d

gpt_courtier_disdain_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_courtier = {
					percent >= @percent_general_1
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value <= -50
					}
				}
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = 40
					add = { value = dread multiply = -0.5 }
					add = { value = primary_spouse.dread multiply = -0.5 }
				}
				random_list = {
					0 = {
						modifier = { add = 15 any_courtier = { percent >= @percent_general_1 opinion = { target = root value <= -50 } } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stress_gain_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_casual_disrespect_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_casual_disrespect_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root

gpt_3_stw = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_steward
				cp:councillor_steward = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_stw_01_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_stw_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_steward.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = random_council_bonus_stw_01_t
							desc = random_council_bonus_stw_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_stw_02_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_stw_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}

gpt_3_dip = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_chancellor
				cp:councillor_chancellor = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_dip_01_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_dip_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_chancellor
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_chancellor = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_chancellor.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = random_council_bonus_dip_01_t
							desc = random_council_bonus_dip_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_chancellor
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_chancellor = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_dip_02_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_dip_02_d

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_chancellor = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_3_mar = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_marshal
				cp:councillor_marshal = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_dynasty = yes
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_mar_01_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_mar_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_marshal.martial }

						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_3_ler = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
				cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_ler_01_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_ler_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_court_chaplain.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = random_council_bonus_ler_01_t
							desc = random_council_bonus_ler_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }

gpt_3_int = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_spymaster
				cp:councillor_spymaster = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_int_01_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_int_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = random_council_bonus_int_01_t
							desc = random_council_bonus_int_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_int_02_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_int_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }

							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = random_council_penalty_int_06_t
							desc = random_council_penalty_int_06_d

						}

						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue }

					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE

							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text

gpt_3_spouse = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = primary_spouse
				has_dynasty = yes
				primary_spouse = {
					is_landed = no
					is_courtier_of = root
					is_imprisoned = no
				}
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = random_spouse_penalty_stw_01_t
							desc = random_spouse_penalty_stw_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = random_spouse_bonus_stw_01_t
							desc = random_spouse_bonus_stw_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } }  }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } 
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = random_spouse_penalty_dip_01_t
							desc = random_spouse_penalty_dip_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = random_spouse_bonus_dip_01_t
							desc = random_spouse_bonus_dip_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } 
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = random_spouse_penalty_mar_01_t
							desc = random_spouse_penalty_mar_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE

						}

						}

						}

					}

							desc = random_spouse_penalty_mar_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = random_spouse_bonus_mar_02_t
							desc = random_spouse_bonus_mar_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } 
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = random_spouse_penalty_ler_02_t
							desc = random_spouse_penalty_ler_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } }  }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = random_spouse_bonus_ler_02_t
							desc = random_spouse_bonus_ler_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } }  }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } 
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = random_spouse_penalty_int_02_t
							desc = random_spouse_penalty_int_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = random_spouse_bonus_int_02_t
							desc = random_spouse_bonus_int_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = random_spouse_penalty_dip_03_t
							desc = random_spouse_penalty_dip_03_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = random_spouse_bonus_dip_03_t
							desc = random_spouse_bonus_dip_03_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } 
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


gpt_3_stw_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_steward
				cp:councillor_steward = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_steward.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_steward.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_03_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_steward.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_03_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_04_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}

						cp:councillor_steward = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_steward.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_stw_04_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}

					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_stw_05_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_steward
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  cp:councillor_steward = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_3_dip_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_chancellor
				cp:councillor_chancellor = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_dip_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_dip_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_chancellor
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_chancellor = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_chancellor.diplomacy }

							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text

							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_dip_01_d

						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_chancellor = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }

gpt_3_mar_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_marshal
				cp:councillor_marshal = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_dynasty = yes
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_mar_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_mar_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_marshal.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_mar_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_mar_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_mar_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_mar_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }

					}
