							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_mar_04_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_marshal.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_mar_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_mar_04_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_mar_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_mar_05_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_marshal.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_mar_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_mar_05_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_marshal
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } cp:councillor_marshal = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_marshal = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_3_ler_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
				cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_court_chaplain.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_ler_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_ler_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_ler_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_court_chaplain.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_ler_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_ler_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }

					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_03_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}

					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_court_chaplain.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_ler_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_ler_03_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }

					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE

							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_04_t

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }

					}

						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_ler_05_t

							left_icon = cp:councillor_court_chaplain
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } cp:councillor_court_chaplain = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }

gpt_3_int_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = cp:councillor_spymaster
				cp:councillor_spymaster = { is_imprisoned = no }
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_int_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_int_01_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_bonus_int_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_int_02_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_03_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE

						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text

						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }

					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_04_t

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					12 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_council_penalty_int_05_d

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_councillor_t desc = bad_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text

							desc = tribal_random_council_bonus_int_05_d
							left_icon = cp:councillor_spymaster
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 cp:councillor_spymaster = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } }
						cp:councillor_spymaster = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_councillor_t desc = good_job_councillor_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_councillor years = 3 } } } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_3_spouse_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				exists = primary_spouse
				has_dynasty = yes
				primary_spouse = {
					is_landed = no
					is_courtier_of = root
					is_imprisoned = no
				}
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_1
				random_list = {
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_stw_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_stw_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_stw_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_stw_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } }  }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } 
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_dip_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_dip_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_dip_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_dip_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } 
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_mar_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_mar_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_mar_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_mar_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } 
					}

							title = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_ler_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_ler_01_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } }  }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE

							desc = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_ler_01_d

						}

							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE

							desc = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_ler_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } }  }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_ler_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_ler_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } }  }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } 
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_int_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_int_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_int_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_int_02_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15
					}
					8 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_dip_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_penalty_dip_03_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } 
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = primary_spouse.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_dip_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_spouse_bonus_dip_03_d
							left_icon = primary_spouse
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } 
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}







gpt_buy_prestige = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = buying_prestige
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 0
						prestige < 0
					}
				}
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = diary_buying_prestige_event_01_t
							desc = diary_buying_prestige_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = diary_buying_prestige_event_02_t
							desc = diary_buying_prestige_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = diary_buying_prestige_event_03_t
							desc = diary_buying_prestige_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = diary_buying_prestige_event_04_t
							desc = diary_buying_prestige_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = diary_buying_prestige_event_05_t
							desc = diary_buying_prestige_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = diary_buying_prestige_event_06_t
							desc = diary_buying_prestige_event_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root

						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }

gpt_buy_piety = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = buying_piety
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 0
						piety < 0
					}
				}
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = diary_buying_piety_event_01_t
							desc = diary_buying_piety_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = diary_buying_piety_event_02_t
							desc = diary_buying_piety_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = diary_buying_piety_event_03_t
							desc = diary_buying_piety_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = diary_buying_piety_event_04_t
							desc = diary_buying_piety_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = diary_buying_piety_event_05_t
							desc = diary_buying_piety_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = diary_buying_piety_event_06_t
							desc = diary_buying_piety_event_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = diary_buying_piety_event_07_t
							desc = diary_buying_piety_event_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root

gpt_buy_renown = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
			 #	exists = house_head
			 #	is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = buying_renown
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						is_house_head = yes
						gold > 0
						dynasty = { dynasty_prestige < 0 }
					}
				}
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = diary_renown_event_01_t
							desc = diary_renown_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = diary_renown_event_02_t
							desc = diary_renown_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}

						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}

							desc = diary_renown_event_19_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = diary_renown_event_20_t
							desc = diary_renown_event_20_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_buy_dread = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_character_flag = buying_dread
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = diary_buying_dread_event_01_t
							desc = diary_buying_dread_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = diary_buying_dread_event_02_t
							desc = diary_buying_dread_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread

gpt_tyranny_gold = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = tyranny_gold
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold < 0
						tyranny <= 20
						monthly_character_income >= 10
						NOR = {
							has_trait = compassionate
							has_trait = humble
							has_trait = just
						}
					}
				}
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tyranny_gold_request_event_01_t
							desc = tyranny_gold_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tyranny_gold_request_event_02_t
							desc = tyranny_gold_request_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tyranny_gold_request_event_03_t
							desc = tyranny_gold_request_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tyranny_gold_request_event_04_t
							desc = tyranny_gold_request_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tyranny_gold_request_event_05_t
							desc = tyranny_gold_request_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tyranny_gold_request_event_06_t
							desc = tyranny_gold_request_event_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {

gpt_tyranny_prestige = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = tyranny_prestige
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold < 0
						prestige < 0
						tyranny <= 20
						monthly_character_income >= 10
						NOR = {
							has_trait = compassionate
							has_trait = humble
							has_trait = just
						}
					}
				}
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tyranny_prestige_request_event_01_t
							desc = tyranny_prestige_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige }
					}

gpt_tyranny_army = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = tyranny_army
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold < 500
						tyranny <= 20
						martial >= 16
						vassal_count >= 10
						OR = {
							has_trait = ambitious
							has_trait = greedy
						}
						NOR = {
							has_trait = compassionate
							has_trait = humble
							has_trait = just
						}
					}
				}
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tyranny_army_request_event_01_t
							desc = tyranny_army_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tyranny_army_request_event_02_t
							desc = tyranny_army_request_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tyranny_army_request_event_03_t
							desc = tyranny_army_request_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tyranny_army_request_event_04_t
							desc = tyranny_army_request_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {

							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tyranny_army_request_event_05_t
							desc = tyranny_army_request_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root

					}
					1 = {

gpt_tyranny_dread = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_character_flag = tyranny_dread
				NOR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_01_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_02_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_03_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_04_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_05_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_06_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_07_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_07_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_08_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_08_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_dread = @buying_dread_ty }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_09_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_09_d

						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tyranny_dread_request_event_10_t
							desc = tyranny_dread_request_event_10_d

						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_dread = @buying_dread_ty
					}
					1 = {

		}
	}

gpt_buy_prestige_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = buying_prestige_tribal
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 500
						prestige < 500
					}
				}
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_03_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_04_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_05_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_06_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_prestige_event_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}

						}

gpt_buy_piety_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = buying_piety_tribal
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 0
						piety < 0
					}
				}
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_03_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_04_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_05_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_piety_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_06_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_piety_event_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying } }
						}

gpt_buy_renown_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
			 #	exists = house_head
			 #	is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = buying_renown_tribal
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						is_house_head = yes
						gold > 0
						dynasty = { dynasty_prestige < 0 }
					}
				}
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_renown_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_diary_renown_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_renown_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_diary_renown_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}

						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
					1 = {

							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_renown_event_18_t
							desc = tribal_diary_renown_event_18_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_renown_event_19_t
							desc = tribal_diary_renown_event_19_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_renown_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_renown_event_20_t
							desc = tribal_diary_renown_event_20_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_renown } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_buy_dread_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_character_flag = buying_dread_tribal
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_03_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_04_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread }
						}
