							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_05_t
							desc = tribal_diary_buying_dread_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @paying } add_dread = @buying_dread }

gpt_tyranny_gold_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = tyranny_gold_tribal
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold < 0
						tyranny <= 20
						monthly_character_income >= 10
						NOR = {
							has_trait = compassionate
							has_trait = humble
							has_trait = just
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_03_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_04_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_05_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {

							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_06_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_06_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {

							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_12_d

						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }

							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_gold_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_15_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_gold_request_event_15_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_gold }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_tyranny_prestige_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = tyranny_prestige_tribal
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold < 0
						prestige < 0
						tyranny <= 20
						monthly_character_income >= 10
						NOR = {
							has_trait = compassionate
							has_trait = humble
							has_trait = just
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_03_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_prestige_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_04_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_prestige_request_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @buying_ty_prestige } }
						}

					}

gpt_tyranny_army_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					has_character_flag = tyranny_army_tribal
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						gold < 500
						tyranny <= 20
						martial >= 16
						vassal_count >= 10
						OR = {
							has_trait = ambitious
							has_trait = greedy
						}
						NOR = {
							has_trait = compassionate
							has_trait = humble
							has_trait = just
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_02_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_03_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_04_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}
						add_tyranny = @paying_ty spawn_army = { levies = { value = 10 multiply = monthly_character_income add = 50 add = { value = 40 multiply = vassal_count divide = highest_held_title_tier } } location = capital_province inheritable = no name = gpt_private_army }
					}
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_tyranny_army_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_05_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_army_request_event_05_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_gain_tip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tyranny_army_tip } }
						}

					}

gpt_tyranny_dread_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_character_flag = tyranny_dread_tribal
				OR = {
				 	# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
				 	culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_buying_dread_with_text
							title = tribal_tyranny_dread_request_event_01_t
							desc = tribal_tyranny_dread_request_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root

gpt_absent = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2
				has_trait = gpt_absent
				NOR = { 
					has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_dip
					has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_stw
					has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_mar
					has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_int
					has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_ler
					has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_pro
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_report_neutral_with_text
				title = gpt_absent_returning_home_t
				desc = gpt_absent_returning_home_d
			 #	left_icon = root
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_trait_force_tooltip = gpt_absent custom_tooltip = { text = absent_returning_tip } }
			}
			remove_trait = gpt_absent
		}

		if = { # stw
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_trait = gpt_absent
				has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_stw
				NOT = {	government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					15 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stewardship_good_with_text
							title = improving_stewardship_event_01_t
							desc = improving_stewardship_event_01_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @absent_stress_gain custom_tooltip = { text = absent_stewardship_tip } }
						}
						add_stewardship_skill = @absent_skill add_stress = @absent_stress_gain add_stewardship_lifestyle_xp = @absent_xp
					}
					15 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stewardship_good_with_text
							title = improving_stewardship_event_02_t
							desc = improving_stewardship_event_02_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @absent_stress_gain custom_tooltip = { text = absent_stewardship_tip } }
						}
						add_stewardship_skill = @absent_skill add_stress = @absent_stress_gain add_stewardship_lifestyle_xp = @absent_xp
					}
					15 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stewardship_good_with_text
							title = improving_stewardship_event_03_t
							desc = improving_stewardship_event_03_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @absent_stress_gain custom_tooltip = { text = absent_stewardship_tip } }
						}
						add_stewardship_skill = @absent_skill add_stress = @absent_stress_gain add_stewardship_lifestyle_xp = @absent_xp
					}
					15 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_stewardship_good_with_text
							title = improving_stewardship_event_04_t
							desc = improving_stewardship_event_04_d
						 #	left_icon = root
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @absent_stress_gain custom_tooltip = { text = absent_stewardship_tip } }
						}
						add_stewardship_skill = @absent_skill add_stress = @absent_stress_gain add_stewardship_lifestyle_xp = @absent_xp
					}
					15 = {

		if = { # mar
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				has_trait = gpt_absent
				has_character_flag = gpt_absent_frag_mar
				NOT = {	government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					15 = {

gpt_3_stw_regent = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					stewardship > diplomacy
					stewardship > martial
					stewardship > intrigue
					stewardship > learning
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = random_regent_penalty_stw_01_t
							desc = random_regent_penalty_stw_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE

				}
			}
		}
	}

gpt_3_dip_regent = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					diplomacy > stewardship
					diplomacy > martial
					diplomacy > intrigue
					diplomacy > learning
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = random_regent_penalty_dip_01_t
							desc = random_regent_penalty_dip_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }

					}

						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.diplomacy }

							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text

					}

gpt_3_mar_regent = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					martial > diplomacy
					martial > stewardship
					martial > intrigue
					martial > learning
				}
				has_dynasty = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = random_regent_penalty_mar_01_t
							desc = random_regent_penalty_mar_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = random_regent_bonus_mar_01_t
							desc = random_regent_bonus_mar_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }

					}

gpt_3_ler_regent = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					learning > diplomacy
					learning > martial
					learning > intrigue
					learning > stewardship
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = random_regent_penalty_ler_01_t
							desc = random_regent_penalty_ler_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = random_regent_bonus_ler_01_t
							desc = random_regent_bonus_ler_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }

gpt_3_int_regent = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					intrigue > diplomacy
					intrigue > martial
					intrigue > stewardship
					intrigue > learning
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				NOR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = random_regent_penalty_int_01_t
							desc = random_regent_penalty_int_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = random_regent_bonus_int_01_t
							desc = random_regent_bonus_int_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = random_regent_penalty_int_02_t
							desc = random_regent_penalty_int_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = random_regent_bonus_int_02_t
							desc = random_regent_bonus_int_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = random_regent_penalty_int_03_t
							desc = random_regent_penalty_int_03_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }

gpt_3_stw_regent_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					stewardship > diplomacy
					stewardship > martial
					stewardship > intrigue
					stewardship > learning
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_stw_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_stw_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_stw_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_stw_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_stw_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_stw_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}

							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_stw_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_stw_04_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_stw_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_stw_05_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }  root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.stewardship }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_stw_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_stw_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_stw_05_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive } } else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_2_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_stw_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_3_dip_regent_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					diplomacy > stewardship
					diplomacy > martial
					diplomacy > intrigue
					diplomacy > learning
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_03_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_03_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_04_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_04_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_04_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}

						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_dip_05_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.diplomacy }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_dip_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_05_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_dip_05_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_dip_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

gpt_3_mar_regent_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					martial > diplomacy
					martial > stewardship
					martial > intrigue
					martial > learning
				}
				has_dynasty = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_mar_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_mar_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_mar_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_mar_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_mar_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_mar_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.martial }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_mar_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_mar_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_positive_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_mar_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_mar_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_mar_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_mar_03_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1 } } } else = { dynasty = { add_dynasty_prestige = { value = root.monthly_character_income divide = root.highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_1_ai } } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }

gpt_3_ler_regent_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					learning > diplomacy
					learning > martial
					learning > intrigue
					learning > stewardship
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_ler_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_ler_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5 } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_5_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.learning }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_ler_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_ler_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_3_positive_ai } } root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_ler_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_ler_bad_with_text

gpt_3_int_regent_tribal = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
			has_game_rule = GPT_few_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				#	is_at_war = no
				has_active_diarchy = yes
				root.diarch = { 
					is_imprisoned = no
					intrigue > diplomacy
					intrigue > martial
					intrigue > stewardship
					intrigue > learning
				}
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					# faith = { has_doctrine_parameter = unreformed }
					government_has_flag = government_is_tribal
					culture = { has_cultural_tradition = tradition_horse_lords }
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = @event_chance_4
				random_list = {
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_int_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_int_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_int_01_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_int_01_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_int_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_int_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_bad_with_text title = bad_job_regent_t desc = bad_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					0 = { # POSITIVE
						modifier = { add = root.diarch.intrigue }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_council_int_good_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_bonus_int_02_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_bonus_int_02_d
							left_icon = root.diarch
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent } } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n1 add_dread = 15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } }
						root.diarch = { send_interface_message = { type = event_council_int_good_with_text title = good_job_regent_t desc = good_job_regent_d left_icon = root show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = good_job_regent years = 1 } } } }
					}
					16 = { # NEGATIVE
						send_interface_message = {

							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_int_03_t
							desc = tribal_random_regent_penalty_int_03_d

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p1 add_dread = -15 root.diarch = { add_character_modifier = { modifier = bad_job_regent } } }

					}

							type = event_council_int_bad_with_text
							title = tribal_random_regent_penalty_int_05_t

}



gpt_sponsoring = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				highest_held_title_tier >= 3
				has_character_flag = any_expedition
				NOR = { 
					has_character_flag = diplomacy_expedition
					has_character_flag = stewardship_expedition
					has_character_flag = martial_expedition
					has_character_flag = intrigue_expedition
					has_character_flag = learning_expedition
					has_character_flag = prowess_expedition
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_decision_start_end_with_text
				title = gpt_end_expedition_t
				desc = gpt_end_expedition_d
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = end_expedition_tip_1 } custom_tooltip = { text = end_expedition_tip_2 } }
			}
			remove_character_flag = any_expedition
		}

		if = { # stw
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 3 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 2000
						stewardship > 12
						is_at_war = no
						OR = {
							has_trait = greedy
							has_trait = gluttonous
							has_trait = lustful
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_character_flag = any_expedition
						has_character_flag = stewardship_expedition
					}
				}
				NOT = {	government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_merchant_failure_1_t
							desc = expedition_merchant_failure_1_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }
					}
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_merchant_failure_2_t
							desc = expedition_merchant_failure_2_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }
					}
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_merchant_failure_3_t
							desc = expedition_merchant_failure_3_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }
					}
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_merchant_failure_4_t
							desc = expedition_merchant_failure_4_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }
					}
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_merchant_failure_5_t
							desc = expedition_merchant_failure_5_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }
					}
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_merchant_failure_6_t
							desc = expedition_merchant_failure_6_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }
						}

					}

							desc = expedition_merchant_minor_success_1_d

						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = expedition_stewardship_minor_success years = 30 } } remove_character_flag = stewardship_expedition

							every_house_member = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										is_house_head = no
									}

		if = { # dip
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 3 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 2000
						diplomacy > 12
						is_at_war = no
						OR = {
							has_trait = gregarious
							has_trait = generous
							has_trait = trusting
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_character_flag = any_expedition
						has_character_flag = diplomacy_expedition
					}
				}
				NOT = {	government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
			}

				chance = 100

					5 = {

		if = { # mar
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 3 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 2000
						martial > 12
						is_at_war = no
						OR = {
							has_trait = brave
							has_trait = ambitious
							has_trait = diligent
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_character_flag = any_expedition
						has_character_flag = martial_expedition
					}
				}
				NOT = {	government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
			}

						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }

		if = { # int
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 3 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 2000
						intrigue > 12
						is_at_war = no
						OR = {
							has_trait = arbitrary
							has_trait = deceitful
							has_trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_character_flag = any_expedition
						has_character_flag = intrigue_expedition
					}
				}
				NOT = {	government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
			}

		if = { # ler
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes

					AND = {
						has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled

						learning > 12

							has_trait = compassionate
							has_trait = zealous

						}
					}

		if = { # pro
			limit = {
				has_dynasty = yes
				exists = house
				is_house_head = yes
				is_adult = yes
				is_ruler = yes
				highest_held_title_tier >= 3 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
						is_ai = yes
						gold > 2000
						prowess > 16
						is_at_war = no
						OR = {
							has_trait = stubborn
							has_trait = wrathful
							has_trait = vengeful
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_character_flag = any_expedition
						has_character_flag = prowess_expedition
					}
				}
				NOT = {	government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
			}

							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }

						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }
					}
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_knights_failure_16_t
							desc = expedition_knights_failure_16_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } custom_tooltip = { text = expedition_failure_tip } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost }
					}
					5 = {
						modifier = { add = { value = highest_held_title_tier multiply = 15 } }
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_expedition_progress_with_text
							title = expedition_knights_failure_17_t
							desc = expedition_knights_failure_17_d

						}

						modifier = { add = monthly_character_income }

							type = event_expedition_success_with_text
							title = expedition_knights_minor_success_1_t
							desc = expedition_knights_minor_success_1_d
							show_as_tooltip = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = expedition_prowess_minor_success years = 30 } } }
						}
						remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @expedition_cost } house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = expedition_prowess_minor_success years = 30 } } remove_character_flag = prowess_expedition
						house = {
							every_house_member = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										is_house_head = no
									}
									send_interface_message = {
										type = event_expedition_success_with_text
										title = expedition_minor_success_t
										desc = expedition_minor_success_d
										show_as_tooltip = { house = { add_house_modifier = { modifier = expedition_prowess_minor_success years = 30 } } }
									}									
								}
							} 
						}
					}

						}
