gpt_war_tax = {
	trigger = {
	 	has_game_rule = GPT_decisions_enabled
		is_at_war = no
		OR = {
			has_character_modifier = gpt_low_war_tax
			has_character_modifier = gpt_medium_war_tax
			has_character_modifier = gpt_high_war_tax
		}
	}
	effect = {
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_war_tax } 
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_decision_start_end_with_text
				title = gpt_end_war_tax_t
				desc = gpt_end_war_tax_d
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_war_tax }
			} 
			remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_war_tax 
		}
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_medium_war_tax } 
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_decision_start_end_with_text
				title = gpt_end_war_tax_t
				desc = gpt_end_war_tax_d
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_character_modifier = gpt_medium_war_tax }
			} 
			remove_character_modifier = gpt_medium_war_tax 
		}
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_high_war_tax } 
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_decision_start_end_with_text
				title = gpt_end_war_tax_t
				desc = gpt_end_war_tax_d
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_character_modifier = gpt_high_war_tax }
			} 
			remove_character_modifier = gpt_high_war_tax 
		}
	}
}


gpt_power_projection = {
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	 	has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
		is_ruler = yes
		highest_held_title_tier >= 2
		is_landed = yes
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_power_projection_trigger_lv5 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_power_projection_trigger_lv4 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_power_projection_trigger_lv3 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_power_projection_trigger_lv2 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else = {
			add_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5 }
		}

		if = { # lv1
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_neutral_with_text
							title = random_insignificant_power_projection_0_t
							desc = random_insignificant_power_projection_0_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv1 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_pptip } }
						}
						add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv2
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_neutral_with_text
							title = random_low_power_projection_t
							desc = random_low_power_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv2 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_pptip } }
						}
						add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv2 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv3
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_good_with_text
							title = random_avg_power_projection_t
							desc = random_avg_power_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv3 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_pptip } }
						}
						add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv3 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv4
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_good_with_text
							title = random_high_power_projection_t
							desc = random_high_power_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv4 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_pptip } }
						}
						add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv4 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv5
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_good_with_text
							title = random_imperial_power_projection_t
							desc = random_imperial_power_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv5 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_pptip } }
						}
						add_prestige_no_experience = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lv5 }
					}
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4
				any_vassal_or_below = {
					has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_projection_t
							desc = random_vassal_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose } }
						}
						add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose }
					}
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3
				any_vassal_or_below = {
					OR = {
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5
					}
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_projection_t
							desc = random_vassal_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose } }
						}
						add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2
				any_vassal_or_below = {
					OR = {
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5
					}
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_projection_t
							desc = random_vassal_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose } }
						}
						add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv1
				any_vassal_or_below = {
					OR = {
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv2
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv3
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv4
						has_character_flag = gpt_power_projection_flag_lv5
					}
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_pp_bad_with_text
							title = random_vassal_projection_t
							desc = random_vassal_projection_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose } }
						}
						add_prestige = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @power_project_lose }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_trade_power = {
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	 	has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
		is_ruler = yes
		highest_held_title_tier >= 2
		is_landed = yes
		any_sub_realm_county = {
			count >= 1
			is_coastal_county = yes
			any_county_province = {
				OR = {
					has_building_or_higher = common_tradeport_01
				}
			}
		}
	}
	effect = {

	 #AGOT Disabled
	 #	if = {
	 #		limit = {
	 #			any_sub_realm_county = {
	 #				count >= 1
	 #				any_county_province = {
	 #					geographical_region = dlc_fp2_mediterranean_shoreline
	 #					has_building_or_higher = common_tradeport_01
	 #				}
	 #			}
	 #		}
	 #		add_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit
	 #	}
	 #	if = {
	 #		limit = {
	 #			NOT = {
	 #				any_sub_realm_county = {
	 #					count >= 1
	 #					any_county_province = {
	 #						geographical_region = dlc_fp2_mediterranean_shoreline
	 #						has_building_or_higher = common_tradeport_01
	 #					}
	 #				}
	 #			}
	 #		}
	 #		if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit }
	 #	}

		if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_trade_power_trigger_lv5 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_trade_power_trigger_lv4 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_trade_power_trigger_lv3 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_trade_power_trigger_lv2 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 }
		}
		else = {
			add_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 } remove_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5 }
		}

		if = { # lv1
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_gpt_trade_neutral_with_text
							title = random_insignificant_trade_power_0_t
							desc = random_insignificant_trade_power_0_d
							show_as_tooltip = {
								if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv1_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip2 } }
								else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv1 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } }
							}
						}
						if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv1_medit } }
						else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv1 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv2
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_gpt_trade_neutral_with_text
							title = random_low_trade_power_0_t
							desc = random_low_trade_power_0_d
							show_as_tooltip = {
								if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv2_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip2 } }
								else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv2 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } }
							}
						}
						if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv2_medit } }
						else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv2 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv3
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_gpt_trade_good_with_text
							title = random_avg_trade_power_0_t
							desc = random_avg_trade_power_0_d
							show_as_tooltip = {
								if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv3_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip2 } }
								else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv3 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } }
							}
						}
						if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv3_medit } }
						else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv3 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv4
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_gpt_trade_good_with_text
							title = random_high_trade_power_0_t
							desc = random_high_trade_power_0_d
							show_as_tooltip = {
								if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv4_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip2 } }
								else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv4 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } }
							}
						}
						if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv4_medit } }
						else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv4 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { # lv5
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5
			}
			random = {
				chance = 100
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_gpt_trade_good_with_text
							title = random_imperial_trade_power_0_t
							desc = random_imperial_trade_power_0_d
							show_as_tooltip = {
								if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv5_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip2 } }
								else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv5 } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } }
							}
						}
						if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv5_medit } }
						else = { add_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @trade_power_lv5 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_piracy = {
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	 	has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
		NOT = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 }
		is_ruler = yes
		highest_held_title_tier >= 2
		is_landed = yes
		OR = {
			has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv1
			has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv2
			has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv3
			has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv4
			has_character_flag = gpt_trade_power_flag_lv5
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_combat_piracy_trigger_lv3 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 }
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_combat_piracy_trigger_lv2 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				gpt_combat_piracy_trigger_lv1 = yes
			}
			add_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1
			if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 }
		  #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 }
		}
		else = {
			add_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv0 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 } remove_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 }
		}


		if = { # piracy
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv3 }
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = 30
					if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv2 } add = -20 }
					if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_combat_piracy_flag_lv1 } add = -10 }
				}
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_gpt_piracy_bad_with_text
							title = random_piracy_malus_1_t
							desc = random_piracy_malus_1_d
							show_as_tooltip = {
								if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @piratary_medit } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_pirate_tt } }
								else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @piratary } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_tptip } }
							}
						}
						if = { limit = { has_character_flag = gpt_trade_medit } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @piratary_medit } }
						else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @piratary } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_landlock = {
	trigger = {
	 	has_game_rule = GPT_micro_enabled
		is_ruler = yes
		is_landed = yes
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes }
				any_sub_realm_county = {
					count >= 1
					is_coastal_county = yes
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_landlock_good_with_text
				title = gpt_coastal_access_t
				desc = gpt_coastal_access_d
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_landlock_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river }
				any_sub_realm_county = {
					count >= 1
					is_riverside_county = yes
				}
				NOT = {
					any_sub_realm_county = {
						count >= 1
						is_coastal_county = yes
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_landlock_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_river_access_t
				desc = gpt_river_access_d
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_landlock_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes }
		  #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock }
				NOT = {
					any_sub_realm_county = {
						count >= 1
						OR = {
							is_coastal_county = yes
							is_riverside_county = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_landlock_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_landlock_access_t
				desc = gpt_landlock_access_d
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_landlock_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock
			if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_yes }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_river }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock } remove_character_modifier = gpt_coastal_landlock }
		}
		else = {  }
	}
}

gpt_liege_opinion = {
	trigger = {
	 	OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_enabled
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_land_disabled
		}
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			AND = {
				is_ruler = yes
				is_landed = yes
			}
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
				exists = root.liege
				root.liege = {
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value < -50
					}
					OR = {
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_2
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_3
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_liege_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_liege_hate_t
				desc = gpt_liege_hate_d
				left_icon = root.liege
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_liege_dilike_lca_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
				exists = root.liege
				root.liege = {
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value < -50
					}
					NOR = {
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_2
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_3
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_liege_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_liege_hate_t
				desc = gpt_liege_hate_d
				left_icon = root.liege
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_liege_dilike_lca_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
			if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
				exists = root.liege
				root.liege = {
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value < 0
					}
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value > -50
					}
					OR = {
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_2
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_3
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_liege_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_liege_dislike_t
				desc = gpt_liege_dislike_d
				left_icon = root.liege
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_liege_dilike_lca_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
			if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
				exists = root.liege
				root.liege = {
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value < 0
					}
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value > -50
					}
					NOR = {
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_2
						has_realm_law = crown_authority_3
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_liege_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_liege_dislike_t
				desc = gpt_liege_dislike_d
				left_icon = root.liege
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_liege_dilike_lca_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
			if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
		}
		else = {  }

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_independent_ruler = no
				exists = root.liege
				root.liege = {
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value > 0
					}
				}
			}
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_independent_ruler = yes
			}
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_low_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_dislike_high_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_low_CA }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA } remove_character_modifier = gpt_liege_hate_high_CA }
		}
	}
}

gpt_terrain = {
	trigger = {
	 	has_game_rule = GPT_micro_enabled
		is_ruler = yes
		is_landed = yes
		sub_realm_size >= 8
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1 }
				NOT = {
					any_sub_realm_county = {
						percent >= 0.05
						any_county_province = {
							OR = {
							 	terrain = farmlands
							 	terrain = floodplains
							 	terrain = oasis
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_farmlands_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_low_population_t
				desc = gpt_low_population_d
				show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1 custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_low_population_tip } }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1
				any_sub_realm_county = {
					percent >= 0.05
					any_county_province = {
						OR = {
						 	terrain = farmlands
						 	terrain = floodplains
						 	terrain = oasis
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_farmlands_neutral_with_text
				title = gpt_normal_population_t
				desc = gpt_normal_population_d
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1 }
			}
			remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1
		}
		else = {  }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1 }
				NOT = {
					any_sub_realm_county = {
						percent >= 0.25
						any_county_province = {
							OR = {
							 	terrain = plains
							 	terrain = drylands
								terrain = forest
								terrain = farmlands
							 	terrain = floodplains
							 	terrain = oasis
							 #	is_coastal = yes
							 #	is_riverside_province = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_plains_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_low_food_t
				desc = gpt_low_food_d
				show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1 custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_low_food_tip } }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1
				any_sub_realm_county = {
					percent >= 0.25
					any_county_province = {
						OR = {
						 	terrain = plains
							terrain = drylands
							terrain = forest
							terrain = farmlands
							terrain = floodplains
							terrain = oasis
						 #	is_coastal = yes
						 #	is_riverside_province = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_plains_neutral_with_text
				title = gpt_normal_food_t
				desc = gpt_normal_food_d
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1 }
			}
			remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1
		}
		else = {  }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1 }
				NOT = {
					any_sub_realm_county = {
						percent >= 0.25
						any_county_province = {
							OR = {
								terrain = mountains
								terrain = desert_mountains
								terrain = forest
								terrain = taiga
								terrain = jungle
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_forest_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_low_production_t
				desc = gpt_low_production_d
				show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1 custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_low_production_tip } }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1
				any_sub_realm_county = {
					percent >= 0.25
					any_county_province = {
						OR = {
						 	terrain = mountains
							terrain = desert_mountains
						 	terrain = forest
						 	terrain = taiga
							terrain = jungle
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_forest_neutral_with_text
				title = gpt_normal_production_t
				desc = gpt_normal_production_d
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1 }
			}
			remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1
		}
		else = {  }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1 }
				any_sub_realm_county = {
					percent >= 0.75
					any_county_province = {
						OR = {
							terrain = wetlands
							terrain = desert
							terrain = hills
							terrain = steppe
							terrain = taiga
							terrain = mountains
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_hills_bad_with_text
				title = gpt_low_control_t
				desc = gpt_low_control_d
				show_as_tooltip = { add_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1 custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_low_control_tip } }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1
				NOT = {
					any_sub_realm_county = {
						percent >= 0.75
						any_county_province = {
							OR = {
								terrain = wetlands
								terrain = desert
								terrain = hills
								terrain = steppe
								terrain = taiga
								terrain = mountains
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_hills_neutral_with_text
				title = gpt_normal_control_t
				desc = gpt_normal_control_d
				show_as_tooltip = { remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1 }
			}
			remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1
		}
		else = {  }		
	}
}

gpt_terrain_remove = {
	trigger = {
	 	has_game_rule = GPT_micro_enabled
		is_ruler = yes
		is_landed = yes
		sub_realm_size <= 7
	}
	effect = {
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1 } remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_control_1 }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1 } remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_food_1 }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1 } remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_population_1 }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1 } remove_character_modifier = gpt_low_production_1 }
	}
}


gpt_ruler_favoritism = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				piety_level >= 1
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_neighboring_and_across_water_top_liege_realm_owner = {
					highest_held_title_tier >= 3
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value >= 50
					}
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_1
					if = { limit = { any_neighboring_and_across_water_top_liege_realm_owner = { count >= 2 highest_held_title_tier >= 3 opinion = { target = root value >= 50 } } } add = 15 }
					if = { limit = { any_neighboring_and_across_water_top_liege_realm_owner = { count >= 3 highest_held_title_tier >= 3 opinion = { target = root value >= 50 } } } add = 15 }
				}
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_favoritism_good_with_text
							title = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_1_t
							desc = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_1_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_favoritism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
					}
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_favoritism_good_with_text
							title = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_2_t
							desc = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_2_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_favoritism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
					}
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_favoritism_good_with_text
							title = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_3_t
							desc = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_3_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_favoritism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
					}
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_favoritism_good_with_text
							title = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_4_t
							desc = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_4_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_favoritism_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
					}
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_favoritism_good_with_text
							title = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_5_t
							desc = random_diplomatic_favor_bonus_5_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_n2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { add_piety = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_favoritism_tip } }
						}

gpt_rival_covert_operations = {
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_all_events
		}
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_diarchy = no
				age >= 14
				is_ruler = yes days_as_ruler >= 270
				highest_held_title_tier >= 2 is_imprisoned = no is_landed = yes
				any_neighboring_and_across_water_top_liege_realm_owner = {
					highest_held_title_tier >= 3
					opinion = {
						target = root
						value <= -50
					}
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = {
					value = @event_chance_3
					if = { limit = { is_ai = yes } add = @ai_neg_chance }
					#add = { value = intrigue multiply = -0.5 }
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = cp:councillor_spymaster
						}
						add = { value = cp:councillor_spymaster.intrigue multiply = -2 }
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_covert_bad_with_text
							title = random_covert_malus_1_t
							desc = random_covert_malus_1_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = covert_op_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
					}

						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_covert_bad_with_text

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = covert_op_tip } }

							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = covert_op_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
					}
					5 = {
						send_interface_message = {
							type = event_covert_bad_with_text
							title = random_covert_malus_13_t
							desc = random_covert_malus_13_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = covert_op_tip } }
						}

					}
					5 = {

							type = event_covert_bad_with_text
							title = random_covert_malus_14_t
							desc = random_covert_malus_14_d
							show_as_tooltip = { add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } } custom_tooltip = { text = covert_op_tip } }
						}
						add_stress = @stress_p2 if = { limit = { is_ai = no } remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive } } else = { remove_short_term_gold = { value = monthly_character_income divide = highest_held_title_tier multiply = @income_4_positive_ai } }
					}
					5 = {

							type = event_covert_bad_with_text
							title = random_covert_malus_15_t
							desc = random_covert_malus_15_d

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}











gpt_vassal_stances = {
	trigger = {
		has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
		NOT = { government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
		has_royal_court = yes
        vassal_count >= 5
		number_of_powerful_vassals >= 5
	}
	effect = {
		if = { #GH
			limit = {
				any_vassal = {
					percent >= 0.3
					has_vassal_stance = glory_hound
				}
				any_powerful_vassal = {
					percent >= 0.5
					has_vassal_stance = glory_hound
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gpt_glory_hound_demands_pos = yes
					NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
				}
				send_interface_message = {
					type = event_gpt_glory_hound_good_with_text
					title = gpt_glory_hounds_sup_t
					desc = gpt_glory_hounds_sup_d
					show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_dominant_glory_hounds_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
				}
				add_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					gpt_glory_hound_demands_dem = yes
					NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
				}
				send_interface_message = {
					type = event_gpt_glory_hound_bad_with_text
					title = gpt_glory_hounds_dem_t
					desc = gpt_glory_hounds_dem_d
					show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_dominant_glory_hounds_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
				}
				add_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem
			 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					gpt_glory_hound_demands_neg = yes
					NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				}
				send_interface_message = {
					type = event_gpt_glory_hound_bad_with_text
					title = gpt_glory_hounds_neg_t
					desc = gpt_glory_hounds_neg_d
					show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_dominant_glory_hounds_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				}
				add_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg
			 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
			}
			else = {  }
		}
		else_if = { #Parochial
			limit = {
				any_vassal = {
					percent >= 0.3
					has_vassal_stance = parochial
				}
				any_powerful_vassal = {
					percent >= 0.5
					has_vassal_stance = parochial
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gpt_parochial_demands_pos = yes
					NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				}
				send_interface_message = {
					type = event_gpt_parochial_good_with_text
					title = gpt_parochials_sup_t
					desc = gpt_parochials_sup_d
					show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_dominant_parochial_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				}
				add_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup
			 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					gpt_parochial_demands_dem = yes
					NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				}
				send_interface_message = {
					type = event_gpt_parochial_bad_with_text
					title = gpt_parochials_dem_t
					desc = gpt_parochials_dem_d
					show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_dominant_parochial_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				}

			 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }

				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }

				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }

					NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }

					title = gpt_parochials_neg_t
					desc = gpt_parochials_neg_d

			 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
			 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
			}
			else = {  }
		}
		else_if = { #Courtly
			limit = {
				any_vassal = {
					percent >= 0.3
					has_vassal_stance = courtly
				}
				any_powerful_vassal = {
					percent >= 0.5
					has_vassal_stance = courtly
				}
