				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
			 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
			}
			else = {  }
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
				}
				send_interface_message = {
					type = event_gpt_unpredictable_good_with_text
					title = gpt_no_dominant_faction_t
					desc = gpt_no_dominant_faction_d
					show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_dominant_not_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
				}
				add_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
				if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
			 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
			}
		}
	}
}

gpt_vassal_stances_remove = {
	trigger = {
		has_game_rule = GPT_trade_enabled
		NOT = { government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
		has_royal_court = yes
        vassal_count <= 5
		number_of_powerful_vassals <= 5
	}
	effect = {
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_sup }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_dem }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_glory_hounds_neg }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_sup }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_dem }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_parochials_neg }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_sup }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_dem }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_courtly_neg }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_sup }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_dem }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_zealot_neg }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_sup }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_dem }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg } remove_character_modifier = gpt_minority_neg }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction } remove_character_modifier = gpt_no_dominant_faction }
	}
}




gpt_emoji = {
	trigger = {
	 	OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_enabled
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_land_disabled
		}
		is_ai = no
	}
	effect = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
				gpt_happy_lv5 = yes
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_emoji_lv5_with_text
				title = gpt_emoji_lv5_t
				desc = gpt_emoji_lv5_d
			 #	left_icon = root
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_emoji_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
				gpt_happy_lv4 = yes
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_emoji_lv4_with_text
				title = gpt_emoji_lv4_t
				desc = gpt_emoji_lv4_d
			 #	left_icon = root
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_emoji_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
				gpt_happy_lv3 = yes
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_emoji_lv3_with_text
				title = gpt_emoji_lv3_t
				desc = gpt_emoji_lv3_d
			 #	left_icon = root
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_emoji_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
				gpt_happy_lv2 = yes
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_emoji_lv2_with_text
				title = gpt_emoji_lv2_t
				desc = gpt_emoji_lv2_d
			 #	left_icon = root
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_emoji_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
		}
		else = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
			}
			send_interface_message = {
				type = event_gpt_emoji_lv1_with_text
				title = gpt_emoji_lv1_t
				desc = gpt_emoji_lv1_d
			 #	left_icon = root
				show_as_tooltip = { custom_tooltip = { text = gpt_emoji_tip } add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
			}
			add_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
		 	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
		 #	if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
		}
	}
}

gpt_emoji_remove = {
	trigger = {
	 	OR = {
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_enabled
			has_game_rule = GPT_micro_land_disabled
		}
		is_ai = yes
		is_ruler = yes
		highest_held_title_tier >= 2
	}
	effect = {
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv5_modif }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv4_modif }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv3_modif }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv2_modif }
		if = { limit = { has_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif } remove_character_modifier = gpt_emoji_lv1_modif }
	}
}


gpt_dynasty_balance = {
	trigger = {
	  	has_game_rule = GPT_balance_enabled
		is_ruler = yes
		highest_held_title_tier >= 4
		exists = dynasty
		exists = house
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count >= 100 } }
			 #	NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
			}
			if = { limit = { NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } } dynasty = { add_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
			if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
			if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 #	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count >= 60 } }
			 #	dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count < 100 } }
			 #	NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
			}
			if = { limit = { NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } } } dynasty = { add_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
			if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 #	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count >= 40 } }
			 #	dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count < 60 } }
			}
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count >= 20 } }
			 #	dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count < 40 } }
			 #	NOT = { faith = { has_doctrine = doctrine_polygamy } }
			 #	NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
			}
			if = { limit = { NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } } } dynasty = { add_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
		 #	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count >= 1 } }
			 #	dynasty = { any_dynasty_member = { is_alive = yes count < 20 } }
			 #	faith = { has_doctrine = doctrine_monogamy }
			 #	NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
			}
			if = { limit = { NOT = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } } dynasty = { add_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
		 #	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
			if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
		}
		else = {
			if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv2 } }
			if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_rising_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv1 } }
		 	if = { limit = { dynasty = { has_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } } dynasty = { remove_dynasty_modifier = gpt_decadent_dynasty_lv2 } }
		}
	}
}
